website_summaries.verdict: Once you get it set up, it's a good choice if you need an outdoor projection screen and don't want to spend a lot of money.
pros: A reasonably priced outdoor model with ample screen size and 4K projection
Includes an accessory kit with a stand and carrying bag
cons: Assembly is required, and the frame poles are a bit flimsy

website_summaries.verdict: This screen offers the versatility to hang on a wall or use the stand.
pros: Light does not shine through the back side
Reflective screen allows you to view, even when it is not quite dark
Velcro straps make it easy to attach to the screen
Stand is solid and easy to set up
cons: A very lightweight screen that can blow over in the wind

customer_reviews.title: Great screen, good price, easy to assemble but make sure you weight it down.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. It stand up and holds the screen well. A few tips: 1) There is really no mechanism to pull the screen down on the bottom and it can ride upwards. Pick up a couple of bungee cords and hook them from the bottom corner grommets to the base of the frame. 2) It isn't very heavy so it will blow over. If you are going to leave it unattended then put something heavy over the back corner tube. If it falls over the screen will get dirty (of course) and can wrinkle. 3) Keep ALL the packing materials including the tube to wrap the screen around. It makes this all much easier to pack and carry.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 hours, extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited for this to arrive in the mail today. The set up was easy and I did it by myself in about 15 minutes. I was letting the frame and screen sit on my patio to get some of the wrinkles out and wow was I surprised when I came back 2 hours later. The screen had already ripped apart from the grommets in 3 different places. Do not waste your time with this product as the quality of the screen is either very poor, or the engineering of attaching it to the frame is faulty. Either way, huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I bought an outdoor screen with eyelets for hanging, but I returned it for this and I'm so glad I did. We took this camping for a week. We were able to place the screen where we wanted it due to it having its own frame. The frame was sturdy and the screen without wrinkles or seams. I put the screen part away each night but left the stand up all week, easy easy easy ... worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: James Brock

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless for permanent application use.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to set this up to use for training. My oppion this is not a travel type. After 30 min. of trying to set up just stapled the screen to wall and started my class. Screen was wrinkled so distortion for my presentation. It has been thrown into the dumpster. May be perfect if a permanent application but every piece mut be taken apart to pavknfor travels. Nothing stays together for quick assembly. Nice bag though.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good screen just needs slight improvements
customer_reviews.text: Screen needs 2 more grommets on each side as it curls up a little on the sides. I also put a little tape on the ends of each of the rods. It makes the entire structure MUCH more stable where you don't even need the hook straps anymore. Overall good screen for the money just needs some minor improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Scott

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I know that there are likely much better products out there but for the price point, we are really happy with this. We have a small house so storage is an issue but this packs up really small. It's also really easy to set up and take down, one person can definitely do it. I screwed a piece of plywood onto the quick release plate that connects to my camera tripod and viola, a quick projector stand that adjusts easily to unlevel ground. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: So glad we were able to send this back
customer_reviews.text: So glad we were able to send this back. It is SO bulky and because of how much space it takes up you would think that it could stay standing. But the slightest breeze too it down. You would definitely need some tie downs (which doesn't come with it) We sent ours back because it didn't pull tight like the picture shows, it was very saggy in the middle and the S hooks didn't fit over the pole.
customer_reviews.author: MamaMeg

customer_reviews.title: We’ve had the inflatable type and they work much better.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Screen can not be pulled taught. There will be waves and wrinkles in the screen. 2. Aluminum stand is flimsy. Any breeze at all and the screen deflects. We’ve had the inflatable type and they work much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ledyard

customer_reviews.title: Rips easily. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Second use and the top corner ripped. I took care of this item and was careful; one slight movement and all of my money was wasted. I simply can not recommend this item and must warn other buyers. Of course I had bought it just long enough ago that my return time had passed. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: suave

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for us! Well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Bought the used version. It is fantastic! Used it for a “homemade drive-in movie theatre” during Covid-19. The poles feel like they could come apart at any time, but we used bungee cords to feel more solid. We also anchored it to the ground in case of wind. We did have a slight breeze and it was totally fine.
customer_reviews.author: AmberD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up! Good build quality! Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews complaining about the setup difficulties. I decided to ignore them and order anyway, and I’m glad I did! I set it up the first time whilst on the phone, half paying attention, and it was pretty easy. It takes maybe 10 minutes, but I’m confident that will get quicker as I put it up and take it down a few more times. Don’t be swayed by reviews saying it’s difficult, because it’s not. The build quality is good and the product is exactly what it is sold as being. Buy with confidence and enjoy your new portable screen!
customer_reviews.author: Sara J.

customer_reviews.title: Portable outdoor screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago. After a lot research and wanting an outdoor set for a long time I chose this screen and I couldn't be happier. It is easy to assemble. It goes together quick! We use it in our backyard and have taken it camping. It is great because if it is late you just take the screen down and put it away! Very happy we went with this screen
customer_reviews.author: MamaMac48

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: It's huge! It's easy to set up as there is no screws it all snaps in. Everything including straps for screen. Love that the screen has a black side so the movie can't be seen from back and also prevents the light from back to come through and you can't see movie. It provides super crisp and clear picture. Only down is i thought the triangle would be better than a stand up one but because it's triangle it takes up more room which is why in picture I only used front frame sort of tweaked it triangle is more for bigger spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Badass

customer_reviews.title: Nice for an outdoor movie night
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought this for some neighborhood outdoor movie nights. Overall, it has worked very well. One suggestion for the manufacturer is to put a layer of thin foam when the screen is rolled up. We found the grommets pressed against the screen and we still have the indentations from them. I'm sure if they will ever completely smooth out (we've used several times and they have not yet).
customer_reviews.author: Mark66

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately this one's a pass
customer_reviews.text: Received mine with all kinds of sick wrinkles and a torn bottom. Reached out to the manufacturer never heard back. The hardware kit that comes with it is nice and makes it convenient for outdoor use and a couple of different variations for indoor use. I like what they thought of I just don't like the way that they shipped it. It arrived completely smashed up total bummer as I think it had potential
customer_reviews.author: GRADE-A-Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts :(
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely BEST purchase so far. However, a rear corner foot connector was missing along with a metal clip/hook. It would be great if they can be shipped to me. I improvised with tape and rubber bands. Also, the ends of all metal bars need to have tape added to the ends in order for them to fit snug, if not they will fall out of the connectors easily. Overall, it’s an great quality product and the screen is heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rikk

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor.
customer_reviews.text: Passed the grandkids test. Great for outdoor movie night. If there is a wind, just put a rock or a block on the corner behind the screen. Screen itself is plenty thick and rolls up in a nice package. Leave the top and bottom triangles together and just lean them up inside the house. Goes together faster the next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect outdoor screen for my balcony.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this portable screen so I could watch games and movies on my balcony using my smart phone. The screen can be hung or on a stand that's included. It's kind of heavy but absolutely portable. I prefer the screen to be heavier so the wind outside doesn't knock the screen around. It is very sturdy. I really like the quality and the price is great to other comparable screens.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Troy

customer_reviews.title: the best customer service and a great product
customer_reviews.text: the best customer service and a great product. I would def recommend an/or by again. takes about 15 mins to set up alone. defenatly need space at least 15 feet, that allows for the best image (depending on set up and projector that is being used) and the frame. I use it all summer long. looking for the warmer weather to pull it out again. The only downfall is that because its portable, it bust be setup/broken-down after every use. may get away with having it up 2 nights as long as its not windy
customer_reviews.author: Majik

customer_reviews.title: It still works great it's just not like new as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It came missing a the s hooks and a the peices to make it into a hanging indoor screen. Plus the screen is slightly wrinkled and has a small line like something drug across it. But it's huge and thick material. I thought when I bought the like new one it was really going to be like new. But it wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Tad

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Solid value, once you understand how to put it together it takes no more than 10 minutes. Materials and design are very good, carry-bag is super convenient. Would love to see this evolve with some folding capability and larger screen options...a 120 inch (or larger) folding version might have us trading up.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Portable, Easy to put together and disassemble. Fits right back in the bag.  Seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at the campground so I needed something easy to pack and easy to put together. This is perfect. I can put it together in just a few minutes, I love that it can be used on the frame or I can use poles to put on the top and bottom of the screen to hang it on the wall in the house. If you want to use indoors, the screen is very large and you need a big open wall to hang it on. It quick to disassemble and fits right back in the bag to store it in. I definitely would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Not durable in warm weather
customer_reviews.text: After about 30 min outside on an 80ish degree evening the grommets began seperating from the screen....returned, it never would have lasted one season.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good size but ok design...
customer_reviews.text: The screen is a decent 16:9 size however the frame doesn't have a positive lock mechanism and the triangle formed at the base is very big. I did get a damaged screen (small but noticeable hole). The only thing that holds the screen to the frame is Velcro strips making it easy to assemble and disassemble however not wind proof.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up, we use it when hosting parties for the football games and on holidays for showing Halloween and Christmas movies in the yard for the neighborhood kids. I am bringing it to a business meeting next week instead on renting one from the hotel for $250. Outside on a windy night we put a couple of landscaping blocks on the legs to keep it steady... LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Tarabyt

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price! We love watching football outside!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's bigger than I thought. Easy to set up, especially after you do it once. I've had it outdoors twice and haven't needed to secure it with anything but it can easily be secured to the ground with a brick or rock if it's a windy day. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jessica J.

customer_reviews.title: Very stable, bright and not much fuss to put together
customer_reviews.text: I like this screen very much and I think it's a good value. Once you learn how to put it together the first time, it comes together quickly in the future. I was impressed with the design and size. I haven't used it out doors but if there's any wind I imagine you may have to weigh down the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. It comes with cords to secure the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. It comes with cords to secure the top and bottom triangles. It really needs the same cords to secure sides from pulling apart. If I want to move it as is, I have to drag it, rather than lift it. I will be purchasing them separately.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Awsome screen
customer_reviews.text: Read directions on how to assemble and you will have no trouble. I got cocky and then slightly confused before reading. Watch the video. It is that simple to construct. Clear and bright. Stable. Everything fits back in the carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great screen for movie night outside
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I wish it was maybe a bit bigger though. My projector rawks. :) It is a little loose. But like some have said. Just get some bungee cord and it works great. It's extremely light weight. Very easy to assemble. I can do it myself in 10 min. Great tip to keep the tube to re-role it up after your done. I'd highly recommend this to anyone that wants to do a backyard movie night. I'll use it camping as well.
customer_reviews.author: david allen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This really was a great buy. It's very easy to set up. It's HUGE and we've not had the first problem out of it. The picture on it looks great, there are no wrinkles in it. Overall great purchase. My family has so enjoyed movie nights outside!
customer_reviews.author: H. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Rewatch the instruction video when setting the full thing up. I forgot to use the connector strings and it was impossible to put together. Setting up is somewhat of a hassle and the stand alone takes up a lot of back space (like 5ft). They don’t give you any replacement connector pieces and one of mine feel off a roof attempting to set this up so now it’s no use. Hopefully I can get the company to send me a replacement peice.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Tran

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up to play a movie for the kids while we were camping. The screen was very easy to set up and worked great. We even used the stand as a towel drying rack during the day. Looking forward to trying the hanging function when we get a chance at home. Highly recommend this screen.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and nice size screen. Convenient and so useful during this pandemic. Connected the fire stick to the projector, made popcorn and watched a movie on the deck with the fam.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Nice Screen
customer_reviews.text: Once assembled this is a great screen. The assembly is ok, it just takes up quite a bit of space behind the screen which is not a problem as I knew that from the description. The assembly is straightforward and the screen itself is very nice. It is wrinkle free, just be sure to roll it up and not fold it. The storage bag is a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: RetiredFF

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very easy setup, best with two people but can be done without too much fuss with one person. It's so compact and stores very easily when not in use, handy carrying/storage bag. Make sure to get your ropes tight so the pieces stay together! I cannot imagine a better value for a large outdoor screen!
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: This screen works great for movies with a bonfire. You do need to weigh it down and a log or two works great. One of our gromments ripped out when a gust of wind caught it before I could weigh it down. However, I purchased a grommet set and added a new one near the ripped out one and it is good to go.
customer_reviews.author: R. Krzeszewski

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality screen takes around 3 to 5 min to set up after you set it up a couple times.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor screen.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for outdoor use and it was great. I was able to assemble by myself and took me about 20mins. Its easy also easy take apart. It was very stable and had no issues, it is made very well and can see this lasting very long. Picture quality is great used it with a HD project and blu-ray player and received multiple compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Bnutz

customer_reviews.title: Its ok not bad
customer_reviews.text: It's ok .set up is ok. Its light. Overall it will do the job. Set up pretty quick.. The only compliant I do have is the corner pieces and the straight pieces fit in to the tubes are very loose they don't stay in tight... if they come up some sort of locking clip for the poles that would be great then I would have probably gave it 5*..
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not "wrinkle free" and can be cumbersome to put up if you don't have help but overall, it's a really great product. The portability factor alone makes it worth the money. The Fran is quite large, so this should only be used outdoor unless you have a massive room to put it in.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fearn

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor screen!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a backyard movie party. Easy setup and breakdown. If it's windy however you may want to weight it down with some small sand bags . Otherwise, the picture was bright and clear and the party was a huge success! Our next test will be taking it camping for a great way to entertain each night!
customer_reviews.author: Bill R Littlejohn

customer_reviews.title: Great summer buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had it in this blazing sun for about a week and nothing happened to it! Great product for the price AND it has its own carrying buy. Our outdoor summer nights have definitely benefited from this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: La Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good screen
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good screen. Not as easy to set up as it should be, and not designed well for using a wall mount screen and taking it outside occasionally. The poles slip into (and fall out of) the joints very easily. A little friction or grip would make it much easier especially for one person. Still a very good deal
customer_reviews.author: freefly

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Entertainment
customer_reviews.text: The screen is a great size for a moderate backyard movie night. I assembled the screen by myself and it was simple to put together; however, it would have been a bit easier with 2 more hands on deck. I was also pleased with the quality of the image but had to wait for twilight for viewing.
customer_reviews.author: BAMBee40

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Transport - Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time this past weekend at a large event with a bunch of kids from the Boy Scouts. It was a huge HIT. The screen really makes a clear and beautiful picture. The stand is really easy to put together and take down. Would recommend this to anyone looking for a portable screen to take with you on trips! Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: VDreyer84

customer_reviews.title: Excellent screen for use outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Excellent screen for use outdoors. Setup takes about 30 minutes the first time if you are doing it by your self. After the first time setup takes about 15 minutes, faster if you have help. You will need a flat area to set up the screen. This is an excellent product that functions as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: difficult assembly but good quality
customer_reviews.text: Actually pretty difficult to put together :( not an easy assembly. With that said, if you are looking for a good screen at a low price then this is it. Good screen works perfect. Plan 20-30 minutes to put together
customer_reviews.author: A.L.B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Have used it twice easy to assemble now that we have done it before! Added additional support for the vertical poles and add some weight to the bottom - works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: That you really need 2 people to set it up and a lot of room
customer_reviews.text: It takes quite a bit of time to set up, and is really hard to do with only one person. Also the frame behind the screen takes up a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: Betty Forgacs

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We received a projector for Christmas and needed a nice screen to watch movies on while camping! I was perfect! Nice and stable and fairly easy to put up the second time around
customer_reviews.author: Debra Murphy

customer_reviews.title: great quality, comes with a caring case
customer_reviews.text: its huge!! great quality, comes with a caring case. worth every penny. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: sno2sand

customer_reviews.title: Good for backyard viewings
customer_reviews.text: Qualify of pic is better on gray screens but for being a white screen it's not too shabby. We did a couple of backyard movie nights and they were super successful. Sturdy and easy to put together. It comes with a nice storage bag with carry strap
customer_reviews.author: R. Bhayani

customer_reviews.title: Takes about 25 minutes to set up, small price to pay for quality and clarity of your movie
customer_reviews.text: Works great and no wrinkles if you take the time to set it up right.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Actual earned a 5 star rating!
customer_reviews.text: This screen is great! I used the front only and hung it from my roof, held it down to the ground with some weights (all on bungees), bought an inflatable couch and had a great outdoor movie night in my back yard. Study material and the carry case is quality as well. I was very surprised and super impressed with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Will L

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the cost. The set up takes about 7-10 minutes once you are familiar. Consider, spend $100 more and you will have quicker set up. For the money spent, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ricky Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: You’ll want to buy spikes to hold it on the ground if you use it outside. A gust of wind blew and ripped the screen in half.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin menes

customer_reviews.title: Works great - 1st use the grommet in one corner ripped ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great - 1st use the grommet in one corner ripped through, that was disappointing. Still using though, sturdy frame and much better than a sheet!
customer_reviews.author: Amber D. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: we watch movies and tv on it. i did weight it down to keep it from moving in the wind i've left it up in rain storms...held up
customer_reviews.author: donna perez

customer_reviews.title: Great product and the customer service by JaeilPLM is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Great product and the customer service by JaeilPLM is outstanding. There were some hooks missing and JaeilPLM quickly responded to all my emails and took care of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier P.

customer_reviews.title: Clear, clean and wrinkle free
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase. The included hardware and instructions allow you to hang this screen anywhere, indoors or outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Vincenzo

customer_reviews.title: This is very large screen and assembly takes time and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very large screen and assembly takes time and would work well for outside patio etc. but to take along as a presentation screen it is not as convenient as th e roll up style.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Mathat

customer_reviews.title: Great screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the same time I bought a projector. This is a great screen for backyard movies. I love the fact that I can just wipe it dry. This is easy to put together and take apart. We camp a lot and we took this camping with us. Nice big quality screen
customer_reviews.author: Amy Snead Mikles

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS SCREEN
customer_reviews.text: We 'borrowed' a blow up screen and had HARD work putting it together. This screen is AWESOME!!! We absolutely love it. Easy to put together, easy to hang, easy to take down, easy to store. EVERYTHING one wants in a screen. Get yours today and enjoy. I would also recommend the 'mini' projector from Brookstone. Lightweight, small and the perfect companion for this screen! Thanks. SEM
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Based off the reviews, I thought this would work for outdoor movie nights. But after setup, I found it very flimsy and the smallest breeze knocked it over. It might be OK to use inside but not something I would recommend for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Good Screen
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Stands on its own. Only issue is it holds great together side to side but lifting it takes 2 cause it will come apart in the middle, top or at the bottom. Would suggest 3 more strings to hold it tight top to bottom for moving. O
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: The screen was very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: The screen was very easy to set up, and it is sturdy. Taking it down and storing is also simple. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Jones-Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Compact, perfect, great viewing space
customer_reviews.text: We have used this half doz times, all outside. Works perfect! Enjoyed movies even on windy nights. Hanging & framed its sooo easy!
customer_reviews.author: ladydi

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I have this screen set up in my garage theater and does what its supposed too. I gave it fewer stars on picture quality, but totally not the screens fault.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany goble

customer_reviews.title: It's fine but not great
customer_reviews.text: The quality is fine but there are not enough ropes to secure all of the posts together. They supply enough to secure the horizontal posts but the horizontal posts require them to make it more secure. If any wind hits the screen the whole thing falls apart. If you are using this inside it's probably fine but the triangle footprint creates space issues.
customer_reviews.author: C and A

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This screen is great, especially for the price. It made it affordable for me to have outdoor movies this summer. I am able to assemble the entire frame by myself in about 15 minutes, and it's quite stable.
customer_reviews.author: L Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, BUT
customer_reviews.text: It's built great, but the Rolling of the screen makes the edges curl. So edges are out of focus. Almost needs a plastic frame for an edge to keep it taunt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together. Movie night in the backyard is a blast with this screen!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: great product, love the size and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy, screen material is sturdy, the carrying case is a plus, will need to weight it down in light wind.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Kreider

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor movies
customer_reviews.text: We use this outside camping, even passerbyers stop to watch. Had a little trouble assembling the first time but gets easier each time you use it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Reine

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. Little loose at the supporting joints
customer_reviews.author: Pam Batista

customer_reviews.title: I found it easy to assemble and was pleased that it hangs wrinkle-free
customer_reviews.text: I found it easy to assemble and was pleased that it hangs wrinkle-free. It has a bright picture with very good viewing angle. It work very well to hand on a wall.
customer_reviews.author: happydoc

customer_reviews.title: Easy of use & quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product, extremely useful for movie night in home & outdoor entertainment. Easy carrying case for transport. Prefer Indicators on poles to assist how tripod should be assembled for quick setup.
customer_reviews.author: L Matthews

customer_reviews.title: A little tedious putting away at the end of the night & ...
customer_reviews.text: A little tedious putting away at the end of the night & it takes up a lot of space, but when it's up it's stable & not a single wrinkle or loose spot on the screen
customer_reviews.author: Ember

customer_reviews.title: Nice projector screen for good price.
customer_reviews.text: Well made projector screen and stand. It is very easy to put together and take down. I would estimate total time to assemble the first time was 20 minutes and to take it down 10 min. The screen itself is good quality as well. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Bug

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and great projector screen. Can easily move to right position
customer_reviews.author: Melonie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and compact storage
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, but I would recommend that you place a sand bag or something on the bottom runners as it is easily blown over in the wind!
customer_reviews.author: Pete Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This movie screen is awesome and met all my expectations! It was easy to put together and take down and I recommend it highly for anyone. We set it up out back for Christmas to have movie night with my grandkids and I was very pleased with how sturdy the frame is and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Nice large screen size, feels durable, easy to set up and store. Great screen!
customer_reviews.author: Sommer

customer_reviews.title: She said "wow that's big"
customer_reviews.text: This was the coolest thing I bought all summer. My Rif6 projector looks great on it. Watched some live sports and a couple kids movies. I couldn't be happier with purchase. The carrying case is great and setup is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product easy to set up a very sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven worrell

customer_reviews.title: Great screen.
customer_reviews.text: Easy build and breakdown... First use took 10min to build. Now I can build in less then 5 and breakdown in the dark.... Nice carrying case and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: I'd really like that foot delivered to me
customer_reviews.text: Item is missing a foot. We had to use duct tape to make it work. I'd really like that foot delivered to me.
customer_reviews.author: Balderdash Nonsense

customer_reviews.title: Not bad to set up
customer_reviews.text: Not bad to set up. Just a little long in the back so if you're intending to use it inside make sure you have plenty of space. You do have option of just using the screen portion inside so that would help. Perfect set up for my proposal for engagement!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Harris

customer_reviews.title: it was easy to put together and we haven't had any problems ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to have outdoor movies...it was easy to put together and we haven't had any problems with it, I recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Minion Ricotta

customer_reviews.title: Much larger than expected but pleased with the size
customer_reviews.text: You will definitely need two people to put this together. The pole system seems a bit flimsy so make sure you tie down your stand. Much larger than expected but pleased with the size.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor movies!
customer_reviews.text: Greatest invention ever! Watching movies outside on a beautiful summer evening with the grand children, there’s nothing like it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A.

customer_reviews.title: Had to jimmy rig with bungee cords to make the ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to jimmy rig with bungee cords to make the screen stay attached. Frame is huge! If buying again, would opt for smaller sized product.
customer_reviews.author: Kamily

customer_reviews.title: This one fit the bill and worked great. Quick and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: We were concerned about purchasing one of the blow up screens as we are located in a windy area. This one fit the bill and worked great. Quick and easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M. Bigham

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice screen however mine came with a missing leg and I had to use a pole from my pool skimmer to finish putting it together but providing all the parts are there it's a pretty good value
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: very easy setup and love that it comes with a travel ...
customer_reviews.text: very easy setup and love that it comes with a travel bag. Only thing is you need is to weigh the poles down for stability since the wind will knock it over. But overall love the screen. thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Quick set up and tear down. Compact when torn down for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: austin james guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Must buy..
customer_reviews.text: OK am impressed! It's awesome . Easy disassemble reassemble and no dang creases. As stated! Ty for an awesome product . That other screen I paid 90 bucks for i's now garbage! Only feedback remotely negative is I wished it was a tad.. bigger..

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product will highly recommend this product. The quality is great and the picture was beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Buy the cheapest one period or build it your self for less than $20
customer_reviews.text: For the price it should be more sturdy. I was thinking about building one until my assures me that your product would do the job. After setup called my self moving it to the spot we setup and of course failed apart and apart until the trustie black tape.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

product_meta.title: JaeilPLM 100-Inch 2-in-1 Portable Projector Screen, Outdoor Indoor Compatible with Triangle Stand or Hanging Design Movie Projection for Home Theater, Gaming, Office
feature_bullets: ALL NEW 100" 2-IN-1 PROJECTOR SCREEN compatible for both indoors and outdoors. You can make 2 TYPES with 1 SCREEN. Freely TRANSFORM to fit your needs with a lot of options. (1-Year Manufacturer’s Warranty & Customer Service Center in Los Angeles, CA)
STANDING TYPE with TRIANGLE BASE is stable with a frame made of aluminum poles. Our screen will not topple over gentle breeze and tolerable impact, unlike the existing Tripod Base.

THE HANGING TYPE represents SIMPLICITY. Only 1 SINGLE NAIL required for Installation, no need to make your wall messy with multiple nail holes on your wall. 4-HOOK-TENSION keeps screen flat for the best viewing quality. Hanging type provides a mobile frame that can be freely hung onto any wall
EASY TO CARRY with CARRY BAG included for family trips, camping, etc. Easily stowed away in the CAR TRUNKS, Sedan included!
EASY TO SETUP - No other tools needed and can be installed without an expert! Setup takes less than 15 minutes only for first time. (TEAM INSTALLATION of just 2 people for Hanging Type recommended).
